content:
Hi all, i have a few questions to zulip.
i want to change the look of the generated emails. Where can i find the files?

i want to use a wildcard certificate with certbot and dns challenge. is there any setup script or how can i connect this key with zulip?

Thank you
@felix schaefer for wildcard certs, you'll just want to just run certbot manually I think; it's pretty simple if you read scripts/setup/setup-certbot -- we just symlink the certificates into place.
